greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Exponential transform of C(n,8) = A000581.
comment: a(n) is the number of ways of placing n labeled balls into indistinguishable boxes, where in each filled box 8 balls are seen at the top.
a(n) is also the number of forests of labeled rooted trees of height at most 1, with n labels, where each root contains 8 labels.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Oct 10 2008
